name: Christopher HEFFRAN, Appellant v. DEPARTMENT OF LABOR AND INDUSTRY, Appellee

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 18th day of October, 2005, the Order of the Commonwealth Court is hereby AFFIRMED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.
